sourcesContent:
export const aboutData = {
    title: 'Who I am',
    description1:
        "I'm Sudhanshu Choudhary, a Software Engineer with 4+ years of experience designing, developing, and deploying scalable web and cloud applications. I'm an AWS Certified Developer with a Master's in Computer Science, focused on building secure, reliable, and data-driven systems.",
    description2:
        'I specialize in Java, Python, JavaScript/TypeScript, and AWS with strong experience in CI/CD and infrastructure as code. I build RESTful APIs, data pipelines, and containerized microservices using Node.js, React/Next.js, Spring Boot, Docker, and Kubernetes—bringing a pragmatic, end-to-end approach to delivering impactful products.',
    image: 2
}
